meanings.definition: To evaluate or estimate the nature, ability, or quality of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She assesses the students' progress in math every week.
meanings.sent2: The teacher assesses the students' understanding of the lesson through quizzes.
meanings.sent3: The detective assesses the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent4: The chef assesses the ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent5: The doctor carefully assesses the patient's symptoms to make a diagnosis.

meanings.definition: To determine the value or amount of something.
meanings.sent1: He assesses the cost of repairing the car before giving an estimate.
meanings.sent2: The appraiser assesses the value of the antique vase.
meanings.sent3: The accountant assesses the company's financial situation before making recommendations.
meanings.sent4: The real estate agent assesses the market value of the house before listing it.
meanings.sent5: The scientist assesses the data collected to draw conclusions.
